string:
Search, Home, Subscription and Comments are filtered to hide content that matches keyword phrases

Limitations
• Some Shorts may not be hidden
• Some UI components may not be hidden
• Searching for a keyword may show no results
Keyword filter for comments is disabled.
Keyword filter for comments is enabled.
Keyword filter for subscriptions is disabled.
Keyword filter for subscriptions is enabled.
Invalid keyword. Cannot use: \'%s\' as a filter

Specify your language template for the number of views shown under each video in the user interface. Each key (a letter/word in your language) -> value (meaning of the key) must be on a new line. Keys go before "->" sign. If you switch app or system language you have to reset this setting.

Examples:
English: 10K views = K -> 1000, views -> views
Spanish: 10 K vistas = K -> 1000, vistas -> views
Videos with views less than this number will be hidden.

"Hide videos with less than 1,000 views exposed to the home feed. Some videos, including those from channels you subscribe to, may not be hidden even if they have fewer than 1,000 views.
It's an old version, if you're using option above, you don't need to use this one."
Swipeable area size can\'t be more than %s%%. Reset to default value.
